Name: Saison l'Hiver
Ingredients: 10 ml Honey syrup (3 parts honey to 1 water by weight)
Instructions: MUDDLE clove in base of shaker. Add next 3 ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. TOP with champagne.
Review: The rich wintery flavours of sloe gin and honey are balanced by lemon juice with clove providing seasonal spice and rosé champagne lifting and refreshing all.
History: Created in September 2014 by yours truly at the Cabinet Room in London, England.
